meanings.definition: equipper: a person or thing that equips
meanings.sent1: The equippers at the store helped me find the right tools.
meanings.sent2: The equippers in the workshop provided safety gear for everyone.
meanings.sent3: The equippers at the gym accidentally gave me two pairs of shoes.
meanings.sent4: The equippers of the spaceship ensured every astronaut had their gear.
meanings.sent5: The equippers in the army made sure every soldier had their weapons and armor.
